I recommend getting the DeArrow browser extension! It replaces all clickbait YouTube titles and thumbnails with a relevant and normal title and thumbnail. It’s a must-have extension in my opinion. I personally pair it with SponsorBlock and uBlock Origin, so I also don’t ever see any sponsored segments or ads either.
